channel.title: conference on Neural Hydrology
channel.description: Recent content in conference on Neural Hydrology

item.title: The persistence of errors: How evaluating models over data partitions relates to a global evaluation
item.description: Oral presentation for EGU General Assembly 2023. This is one about a certain phenomena that appears when we evaluate a model over subsets of the data. Eventually the plan is to make a technical note out of it.

item.title: Rate my Hydrograph: Evaluating the Conformity of Expert Judgment and Quantitative Metrics
item.description: Oral presentation at the EGU General Assembly 2022 on a social study to compare expert rankings of simulated hydrographs with quantitative metrics.

item.title: Deficiencies in Hydrological Modelling Practices
item.description: Oral presentation for EGU General Assembly 2022. This is where my model evaluation journey started.

item.title: Forward vs. Inverse Methods for Using Near-Real-Time Streamflow Observation Data in Long Short-Term Memory Networks
item.description: Presentation at the AGU 2021 Fall Meeting presenting approaches to improve LSTM streamflow predictions with near-real-time observation data.

item.title: Multi-Timescale LSTM for Rainfall–Runoff Forecasting
item.description: Oral presentation at the virtual EGU General Assembly 2021 on rainfall–runoff forecasting with Multi-Timescale LSTM.

item.title: Large-scale river network modeling using Graph Neural Networks
item.description: Oral presentation at the virtual EGU General Assembly 2021 on rainfall–runoff prediction with Graph Neural Networks.

item.title: Uncertainty estimation with LSTM based rainfall-runoff models
item.description: Oral presentation at the virtual EGU General Assembly 2021 on uncertainty prediction with LSTMs in the context of rainfall-runoff modeling.

item.title: LamaH-CE: LArge-SaMple DAta for Hydrology and Environmental Sciences for Central Europe
item.description: LamaH-CE contains a collection of runoff and meteorological time series as well as various (catchment) attributes for 859 gauged basins in the upper Danube catchment and Austria.

item.title: Examining the uncertainty estimation properties of LSTM based rainfall-runoff models
item.description: Oral presentation at the virtual AGU Fall Meeting 2020 on uncertainty prediction with LSTMs in the context of rainfall-runoff modeling.

item.title: LSTM-Based Rainfall–Runoff Modeling at Arbitrary Time Scales
item.description: Oral presentation at the virtual AGU Fall Meeting 2020 on streamflow prediction at arbitraty timescales with a single LSTM-based model.

item.title: HydroNets: Leveraging River Network Structure and Deep Neural Networks for Hydrologic Modeling
item.description: Virtual presentation at the EGU General Assembly 2020 presenting the HydroNets architecture for modeling entire river networks.

item.title: Learning from mistakes: Online updating for deep learning models
item.description: Virtual presentation at the EGU General Assembly 2020 on data assimilation with LSTM-based models.

item.title: The performance of LSTM models from basin to continental scales
item.description: Virtual presentation at the EGU General Assembly 2020 comparing LSTMs trained for each basin individually with a single LSTM trained for all basins together.

item.title: Towards deep learning based flood forecasting for ungauged basins
item.description: Invited talk at the EGU General Assembly 2020 on using LSTMs for flood forecasting in ungauged basins.

item.title: Large-Scale Rainfall-Runoff Modeling using the Long Short-Term Memory Network
item.description: Presentation at the AGU 2019 Fall Meeting presenting our recent results on large-scale hydrological modeling using LSTMs.

item.title: Machine Learning for Streamflow Prediction: Current Status and Future Prospects
item.description: Poster at the AGU 2019 Fall Meeting presenting Martins work on a model comparison study for the Great Lakes/Lake Erie area.

item.title: Using large data sets towards generating a catchment aware hydrological model for global applications
item.description: PICO presentation at the EGU General Assembly 2019 on prediction in ungauged basins using LSTM based models.

item.title: Towards the quantification of uncertainty for deep learning based rainfall-runoff models
item.description: Poster presentation at the EGU General Assembly 2019 on uncertainty estimation using MC-Dropout and LSTMs.

item.title: Do internals of neural networks make sense in the context of hydrology?
item.description: Presentation at the AGU 2018 Fall Meeting on experiments regarding the interpretability of LSTM states.
